document.full_text: nearly 500,000 dorel asia wooden bunk beds sold at walmart, kmart, and target stores have been voluntarily recalled to repair for collapse and fall hazards, the u.s. and canadian governments said on thursday.
document.title: nearly 500,000 bunk beds recalled
lines_and_colors: nearly 500,000 dorel asia wooden bunk beds sold at walmart, kmart, and target stores have been voluntarily recalled to repair for collapse and fall hazards, the u.s. and canadian governments said on thursday.
